name: pasta
description: Pasta is a simple self-hosted pastebin service for storing text snippets. It supports themes, expiration, and syntax highlighting with a minimal web interface.

features.title: Text Snippet Storage
features.description: Store and share code snippets, logs, or text content with unique URLs for easy reference

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Choose from multiple color themes including light and dark modes for comfortable viewing

features.title: Raw Text View
features.description: Access paste content as plain text for easy copying, downloading, or integration with command-line tools

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Create and share pastes immediately without account creation for quick, anonymous sharing

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Clean, distraction-free UI focuses on content with simple navigation and fast loading times
